result.markdown:
--- title: "NARC-1" format: html: code-fold: true format-links: [pdf] pdf: default --- ## Overview NARC-1 is the first HF station on your left as you enter the station. ![NARC-1 operating position](include/img/narc-1-operating-position.jpeg) ### Equipment summary - [Icom IC-7610 (HF + 6m) transceiver](ic-7610.qmd) - Astron RS-35A power supply - Icom SM-50 desk mic - Clipper PTT footswitch - Heil Pro-7 headset - Nifty mini-manual and other manuals - Check the right side of the operating position and the drawer under the radio. - HP PC, dual monitor set-up - Elecraft [KPA1500](KPA1500.qmd) amplifier - Elecraft power supply ### Connection scheme ```{mermaid} flowchart TD A[IC-7610] ---|Coax-Ant1|B[KPA-1500 Ant 1] A ---|RCA ALC|B A ---|RCA Send|B A --> M(Morse Paddles) A --> N(Clipper footswitch) A ---|USB|C[NARC1 PC] C ---|USB|F(Keyboard) C ---|Bluetooth|G(Mouse) C ---|HDMI|H(Monitor) C ---|CAT 6|L(Network Switch) J ---|AC Power| C E ---|120V AC|I(Kasa Switch) I ---|AC Power|J(Surge Protector) I ---|Wifi|K(NARC wifi) A ---|Power Cable|E(Astron RS-35A) B ---|Coax Ant1|D(Antenna Connectors) H ---|AC Power|J ``` ### Software summary ::: {.callout-note} These sections are generated by parsing a CSV data file in `include/csv/software_versions.csv`. The code is hidden in the output for aesthetic reasons, but may be revealed by examining the source code file. ::: ::: {.cell} ::: #### Operating System ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
software version date
MS Windows 10 2024-05-22
````` ::: ::: #### Digital modes ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}

````` ::: ::: #### Logging ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}

````` ::: ::: ### Operating Guide The operating guide for the IC-7610 is [here](ic-7610.qmd).
